title: By the King. A proclamation for the authorizing and vniformitie of the Booke of Common Prayer to be vsed throughout the realme
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
notes: Reprinted as a bifolium in STC 16326; also reprinted as a broadside in 1642 (Wing C2601) and 1660 (Wing, 2nd ed. C3316a)--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
